Campeonato Paulista: 1920, 1926, 1927, 1932, 1933, 1934, 1936, 1940, 1942, 1944, 1947, 1950, 1959, 1963, 1966, 1972, 1974, 1976, 1993, 1994, 1996, 2008, 2020, 2022
Campeonato Brasileiro: 1960, 1967, 1969, 1972, 1973, 1993, 1994, 2016, 2018, 2022
